text: Soni kulikose kumpite (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) basi galauchisyani ngope jenu ku Nsikiti Wakuchimbichika, nombe palipose pachim'be ŵanganyammwe basi galauchisyani ngope syenu ku upandeo, kuti ŵandu akasakola maloŵe gakutataŵana namwe, ikaŵeje ŵawowopeo ŵalitendele lupuso mwa jamanjao, basi ngasimwajogopaga ŵanganyao nambo munjogopeje Une, ni kuti ngwanilisye chindimba Changu pa jenumanja kuti n'jongoche
